author: francescobrivio
body:
#### PR description:
Backport of #37214 to 12_2_X
Modernize the `DQM/BeamMonitor/plugins/TKStatus` plugin to use `DCSRecord` token in case the DCS information from SCAL is not available (i.e. from Run3 onwards).

#### PR validation:
Code compiles + see tests in master PR.
@cms-sw/dqm-l2 This backport should be tested online at P5.

#### Backport:
Backport of #37214
title: [12_2_X] Modernize `DQM/BeamMonitor/plugins/TKStatus` plugin
